patterns: Tell me about Perfect Coaching Centre
What is Perfect Coaching Centre?
Where is Perfect Coaching Centre located?
What is the vision of your institute?
What is your mission?
Can you provide details about Perfect Coaching Centre?
What courses does Perfect Coaching Centre offer?
How can I contact Perfect Coaching Centre?
responses: Perfect Coaching Centre (PCC) is a premier educational institution dedicated to academic excellence and personal growth. Located at 32/2 Mon Mohan Ghosh Street, Krishnagar, Nadia, West Bengal, PCC offers personalized education, career counseling, and holistic development. Learn more: [About Us](https://pcc.duoples.com/#about).

patterns: How can I contact PCC?
What is the phone number for PCC?
What is your email address?
How do I get in touch?
Can you provide PCC's contact details?
How can I reach PCC?
Is there a way to contact PCC?
How do I get in touch with PCC support?
responses: You can contact us via phone at +91 7872461758 or +91 9933115723. Email us at contact@pcc.duoples.com. Visit this for more [Contact Us](https://pcc.duoples.com/contact).

patterns: What courses do you offer?
Tell me about the available courses
List the courses you provide
Do you offer NEET or JEE preparation?
Can you share details about your courses?
What types of courses are available for students?
Which subjects do your courses cover?
Can you provide a list of your courses?
responses:
We offer the following courses:

1. Competitive Exam Coaching (UPSC, TET, SSC, etc.)
2. Academic Coaching (Class I to XII, NEET, JEE)
3. Career Counseling and Personality Development

For more, visit the courses section.

responses: Our faculty includes highly experienced educators like Dipendu Sir (Computer), Arnab Sir (Competitive Exams), Siddhartha Sir (Mathematics), and others. Want more: [Faculty Details](https://pcc.duoples.com/#institute_member).

patterns: How can I enroll in your institute?

What is the procedure to apply for admission?
responses: To enroll at PCC, visit our center, call us at +91 7872461758, or email contact@pcc.duoples.com. Online registration is also available here: [Apply Now](https://pcc.duoples.com/apply).

patterns: Do you provide coaching for UPSC?
Tell me about your competitive exam courses
What exams do you prepare students for?
Do you offer training for government job exams?
Which competitive exams do you cover?
Can you help with preparation for SSC or banking exams?
Do you have coaching programs for civil services exams?
Can you help me prepare for railway recruitment exams?
responses: We offer coaching for various competitive exams, including UPSC, SSC, PSC, TET, WBCS, RAIL, Group C & D, and Police (Central & State). For more, check out our courses section.
